welcome.title: Welcome to Bakabase
welcome.description: Let's take a quick tour of Bakabase's core features to help you manage and browse your media resources effectively.

pathMark.title: Path Marks
pathMark.subtitle: Connect your media library and start managing resources
pathMark.point1: Add media folders as path marks
pathMark.point2: Set tags for different types of resources
pathMark.point3: Automatically scan and index your media files

resourceProfile.title: Resource Profiles
resourceProfile.subtitle: Customize how resources are displayed and processed
resourceProfile.point1: Create profile schemes for different resource types
resourceProfile.point3: Set up playback and preview options

resourceBrowsing.title: Resource Browsing
resourceBrowsing.subtitle: Powerful search and filtering capabilities
resourceBrowsing.point2: Switch between list and grid views
resourceBrowsing.point3: Quickly find and access your resources

downloader.title: Downloader
downloader.subtitle: Enhance resources with metadata and covers

fileMover.title: File Mover
fileMover.subtitle: Intelligently organize your file structure
fileMover.point1: Automatically move files based on rules

completion.title: You're All Set!
completion.description: You've learned about Bakabase's main features. Now you can start by adding your first path mark and begin managing your media resources!
completion.hint: You can view this guide again anytime in settings
